title: en tAi mInAkSiyammai
sahitya:
en tAi mInAkSiyammai tanda varattinAlE indap-piravi uidadE aruL peidadE


anupallavi

  cintai kuLira nalla shen tamizh pADiyE vandanai sheidu sheiden vAzhvu sirandadammA


caraNam    tetteDukkap-pughunda selvan kuvitta ponnait-tINDAd-avaL anbaiyE vENDip-pugahal aDaindEn
attaruNamE shuddha shakti shuDarAi vandE shuddhAnandamAkkiya nittiya kalyANiyE
